[Stride](Released when both players' vanguards are grade 3 or greater!)-Stride Step-[Choose one or more cards with the sum of their grades being 3 or greater from your hand, and discard them] [Stride] this card on your (VC) from face down.
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[Counter-Blast 1] Choose up to two cards from your drop zone, and call them to separate (RC) with a unit.

name: Legend of the Glass Shoe, Amoris
effect:
[Stride](Released when both players' vanguards are grade 3 or greater!)-Stride Step-[Choose one or more cards with the sum of their grades being 3 or greater from your hand, and discard them] [Stride] this card on your (VC) from face down.
[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), choose up to two of your rear-guards, and return them to your hand.

name: Marine General of Heavenly Silk, Sokrates
effect:
[Stride](Released when both players' vanguards are grade 3 or greater!)-Stride Step-[Choose one or more cards with the sum of their grades being 3 or greater from your hand, and discard them] [Stride] this card on your (VC) from face down.
[AUTO](VC):[Counter-Blast 1] When your unit attacks a vanguard, if it is the third battle of that turn or more, you may pay the cost. If you do, that unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle.

name: Deforestation Mutant Deity, Jaggydevil
effect:
Updated: Text
[Stride]-Stride Step-[COST][Choose one or more cards from hand with the sum of their grades being 3 or greater, and discard them], and [Stride] this card on your (VC) from face down.
[ACT]G Zone:If your vanguard is a grade 3 "Intimidating Mutant, Darkface", and you did not get an Imaginary Gift this fight, [COST][choose one or more cards from hand with the sum of their grades being 3 or greater, and discard them], and [Stride] this card on your (VC) from face down. Then, [COST][turn a card from G zone with the same card name as this unit face up], and you get two Imaginary Gift:Protect.
[CONT](VC):This unit's "when attack hits" effects activate even if the attack did not hit.
[AUTO](VC):When this unit's attack hits a vanguard, choose one of your opponent's rear-guards each from their front row and back row, and those units cannot [Stand] during the next stand phase.

name: Omniscience Dragon, Wisdom Teller Dragon
effect:
[Stride](Released when both players' vanguards are grade 3 or greater!)-Stride Step-[Choose one or more cards with the sum of their grades being 3 or greater from your hand, and discard them] [Stride] this card on your (VC) from face down.
[AUTO](VC):When this unit's attack hits a vanguard, choose one of your rear-guards, until end of turn, it gets [Power] +4000, and "[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, if this unit's [Power] is 20000 or greater, draw a card.".

name: Sacred Tree Dragon, Multivitamin Dragon
effect:

name: Rain Element, Madew
effect:

[CONT]:This card is from all clans and nations.

name: Light Elemental, Peaker
effect:
Updated: Text
